title: Strategic Choice Approach (SCA) Workshop for Higher Education Curriculum Restructuring

context.prior_knowledge: Curriculum development and management experience, understanding of higher education policy
context.additional_context: Corporate university curriculum redesign scenarios requiring coordination of diverse stakeholder perspectives

learning_goals: Design stakeholder consensus-building strategies when restructuring curricula using the SCA methodology
Develop systematic decision-making capabilities for prioritizing curriculum development through conflict scenario analysis
Systematically collect requirements from large stakeholder groups using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
